name: jsts
description: A JavaScript library of spatial predicates and functions for processing geometry
author: Bj√∂rn Harrtell <bjorn@wololo.org>

scripts.build-node: rollup -c rollup.config.node.js | GITHASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) babel --presets es2015 --plugins transform-inline-environment-variables | uglifyjs -c -m --screw-ie8 | (cat license.txt && cat) > dist/jsts.min.js
scripts.build-browser: rollup -c rollup.config.browser.js | GITHASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) babel --presets es2015 --plugins transform-inline-environment-variables | browserify - | uglifyjs -c -m --screw-ie8 | (cat license.txt && cat) > dist/jsts.min.js
scripts.build-tests: NODE_PATH=src browserify test/auto/browser/runner.js -o dist/tests.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
